Projects: Garage Bar

Sharing a Vision Garage Bar

The team at Relay worked with an inspired chef and innovative restauranteur to create a brand identity that blends perfectly with the atmosphere and influences of the restaurant.

Collaborating on a vision

The team at Relay worked with the talented folks behind Garage Bar to imagine designs that complemented the chef and restauranteur's vision – from the menus on the tables to the signs on the doors, as well as marketing materials and the website.

Timeless flavor

Garage Bar is located in a former automotive garage. It was important for the brand to match the vibe of the space itself, which, although renovated, retains its rough-around-the-edges charm. The team from Relay took inspiration from the design of items left behind by the former tenants – mechanics' invoice slips, a vintage calendar, a typeface found on old-school ballpoint pens. Collectively, these elements add up to a memorable experience for guests.

Services

  • Brand Strategy
  • Logo and Identity System Design
  • Advertising
  • Collateral Design
  • Signage
  • Website Design & Development
